synopsis.text: God's cosmic blunder results in the untimely demise of Touya Mochizuki, but as divine compensation, he is reincarnated into a realm of magic and mystery. Seizing the opportunity, Touya requests to retain his smartphone in this new world. As he navigates through this uncharted territory, he forms alliances with influential figures, unearths the hidden legacy of an ancient civilization, and acquires formidable powers that rival those of the world's monarchs. All the while, a colorful cast of female companions vie for his attention, turning his fantastical journey into an unpredictable romantic escapade. Prepare for a thrilling adventure filled with enchantment, camaraderie, and smartphone-fueled exploits in this captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
